1.content: You are at school, and in the washroom. After finishing peeing, one of the people you know from your English class walks in. He starts walking towards you, and reaches into his pocket. His name is:
1.title: The Start

11.content: You wash your hands slowly, and notice Matt heading towards the sink. You say hi, seconds before he lunges at you, inserting a syringe into your neck. The liquid is injected into your blood, and you instantly begin to shrink. You keep getting smaller, and smaller, watching Matt howl above you. You continue to rapidly shrink. You stop at:
11.title: Matt

111.content: At 5 inches tall, Matt towers above you like a skyscraper. A large grin escapes his mouth, and he reaches down to grab you. You always used to look down at Matt, but now he is the one looking down at you! Matt scoops you up in his giant hands, and moves you to:
111.title: 5 Inches

choices: Uses the toilet ontop of you
1111.content: Matt pulls open the back of his jeans, and wedges you in his butcrack. You are held firmly in place by two muscular pieces of skin. They slowly close around you, bringing you into a smelly, hairy, and dark prison. You have a rumble, and are quickly hit with a blast of warm air, which smells incredibly bad. Matt is farting up a storm, and continues farting while you are down there. Your body quickly absorbs the smell of his farts, causing you to small horrible. After hours of being down there, Matt finally sits down on the toilet. You fall out, and land in the water below. You look up, just as Matt spits a huge ball of spit down into the toilet, which hits you. Next, Matt:
1111.title: Moves you to his ass

choices: Takes you to work in his shoe
11111.content: You look up as the light dissapears from the top of the toilet. Matt grunts and releases a giant wet poo from his ass. It rains down on you, and he laughs. He starts gagging at the smell of his own crap, and laughs at your misery as you sit in the sewage. Finally he fishes you out with a toilet brush, and throw you into the sink, washing you down. Next he:
11111.title: Uses the toilet ontop of you

111111.content:
Matt puts you in his sweaty old Reebok's, and bikes to work. It is an incredibly humid day, and you are gasping for air in your dark, humid prison. Today is your unlucky day. Matt is working a 9 hour shift this afternoon, and most of it is outdoors. You pass out from the strong, rank smell....

You wake up to Matt tipping you out of his shoe, and see him still in his work clothes. You recognize his bedroom, so you realize his workday is over. However, Matt is incredibly sweaty and you see the sweat running down from his hair, and armpits. He picks you up, mocking you as he puts you....
111111.title: Takes you to work in his shoe

choices: Matt takes you to his house
112.content: At 4 inches tall, Matt makes you look like a speck of dust. He scoops you up into his hands, and shoves you into his pocket. You try to reach out, but you can’t. Matt begins to move, and you are trapped inside his pocket, which is full of candy wrappers. The smell of sweat seeps into Matt's pockets after a while, as he continues to move.
112.title: 4 Inches

choices: You wake up at Luke's house
12.content: Luke takes out his iPod, and invites you to watch a quick video with him. You agree, and he turns it on. While watching the video with him, you feel a sharp pain in your leg, which causes you to collapse. Luke has a sick smile on his face, as he looks at you, lying on the ground. He carves a massive fart in your face, which reeks of beef, and chicken. You immediately begin to shrink, down to only a few inches tall. Luke scoops you up into his hands, and you pass out.
12.title: Luke

121.content: You wake up in a dark, smelly spot, the socks which Luke has been wearing all day. The air smells of wet, sweaty feet, which fills your nose. Suddenly, the sock is flipped, and you roll out onto Luke's bed. "Hahaha, you're mine now" he says. "I'm going to make your life a living hell. I'm your master." As soon as Luke finished what he was saying, he picks you up by the leg, and carries you out of the room. Luke walks down the hall from his room into the:
121.title: You wake up at Luke's house

1211.content: Luke walks with you in his hand into the bathroom. An evil grin is on his face, as he walks towards the toilet. "Man, that chicken is going to be smelly" he says. Luke pulls down his Quiksilver Jeans, and spreads his legs. Swiftly, he drops you into the water below, putting you into partial darkness. A yellow torrent of water enters the bowl, as Luke pees. Suddenly, a strong, smelly gust of air hits you, as Luke farts. His cheeks spread, as a piece of poo falls out, and plummets into the bowl. You barely miss getting hit by it, and the others which follow it. Luke howls with laughter, enjoying every minute of this. He gives himself a few quick wipes with toilet paper, and stands up. Looking down into the bowl he cockily says "Enjoy your little treat?" You shout back at him "Get me out of here". Luke leaves the room for a few minutes after you say this, as you bob in the pool of waste. He finally returns, and uses a toilet brush to remove you from the bowl, plopping you down on the bathroom counter. He wipes you off, and he pick you up, moving you towards:
1211.title: Bathroom

choices: Force you to clean his shoes
12111.content:
Luke gets a huge smirk on his face as you know he has just got another sick idea of how to torture you. Luke undoes his belt, and swiftly moves you underneath his soaking wet, smelly ballsack. You are literally glued by the sweat to it, as Luke traps you in there, and goes about his daily business.

After several hours, Luke finally opens up his jeans, and removes you. He then moves you to a sock cage he has prepared, from today's socks from hockey practice. He puts you in them, laughs, and then closes off the exit, sealing you in a dark, humid sweaty sock for the rest of the night.

In the morning, Luke picks up your sock, and dumps you out while you are still asleep. Today's Saturday, and he has just decided what fun you have in store today.
12111.title: His crotch

121111.content: He pick you up and puts you at the edge of his bed, you look up and see a huge bubbly butt descending onto you. He grinds his dirty sweaty ass into the bed pushing you right to his hole. You hear a rumbling above and his hole opens up blowing a nasty wet fart into your face. As his hole is closing it sucks you half way in. He starts laughing hahha this is prefect yeah keep kicking your making me hard
121111.title: Fart on during video gaming

choices: Luke puts you in his mouth
12112.content: Luke moves you up towards his armpits, which reak of sweat. He puts you right into his armpit, and closes it around you. You are encased in a smelly, dark cavern. Sweat drips rapidly from Luke's sweaty armpits, drenching you. The smell of body odour is so strong that you gag. You hear Luke laughing as you pounds on the inside of his armpit, trying to get out. Luke eventually opens his armpit, and you tumble down onto the floor. You land on a soft, carpet, which cushions your fall. Luke picks you up, and:
12112.title: His armpits

12113.content: Luke moves you down towards his Under Armour shoes, and drops you into the side of them. You fall in between his sweaty socks, and the side of the shoe. He wiggles his toes, and you fall down into the bottom of the shoe. Luke's shoes smell incredibly smelly, and are damp from sweat. His shoe moves up, and down for ages, causing you to feel sick. His smelly feet fill the air, and you cannot escape. Finally, Luke takes off his shoe, and you see him dressed in a hockey uniform. He looks around quickly, before transporting you from his running shoes to his:
12113.title: His shoe

info.brief_description: This story takes you through a journey of being shrunk, and choosing your own path.
info.description: This story begins at a school, and ends wherever you want it to. Readers are encouraged to add to the story, but please use proper grammar, and readable wording. Make sure to follow the plotline, and keep the story on track! The main character is YOU, and the other two main characters are Matt, and Luke.
